statements: DELETE FROM player_metrics WHERE player_id = 100 AND games_played < 10;
DELETE FROM performance_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 500 AND analysis_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_metrics WHERE player_id = 123 AND metric_name = 'kills';
DELETE FROM player_scores WHERE level_completed = false AND player_id = 456;
DELETE FROM player_scores WHERE player_id = 100 AND level_completed = true;
DELETE FROM player_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'accuracy' AND time_recorded < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_scores WHERE player_id = 1 AND score > 1000;
DELETE FROM player_info WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM player_training WHERE player_id = 101 AND skill_area = 'Defense';
